results.description: Prefer low-residual-volatility and small-cap names: resvol / market cap. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol and current_market_cap_usd (SUGGESTION1). No vectors. Implementation divide + zscore. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum x prospect specret monthly for midcaps
results.description: Use prospect monthly specret to confirm momentum in midcaps. To respect <=2 fields pick rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_monthly (SUGGESTION1). No vectors. Implementation multiply + zscore. Confidence: 0.70
